Turn each face-down creature face up. [i](Instant and sorcery cards turned face up this way remain on the battlefield face-down.)[/i]
Spellmorph {3}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Cast it any time for its spellmorph cost.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Cthulu, invoking old ones

Mechanical Uniqueness — Spellmorph
